column4: Please join the channel #ubuntu+1. There your question will be answered more thoroughly.
there is no such manual as setlocale or at least not on my system
Do you have installed the DEB program package 'locales'?

So you better install this package.
looking online for it still the links im being given dont have the package
(I hope we are speaking about Ubuntu version 8.04 or higher.) I am surprised that Synaptic does not offer you this package for download. In that case please check your repositories list.
Please explain the abbreviation 'nvm'. Does it stand for 'never mind'?
you got it sorry wont use it again
Try to find this package on an Ubuntu CD. I am not sure but I believe it is on it.
best bet ask a friend to install it as well and the reason is because it is not relevant to ubuntu and i doubt ppl would be bothered here
I cannot find your question there.
